tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary: Okay but when Arya gets back to Winterfell i need there to be a scene where she takes flowers to Ned’s grave like she did when...
body:
Okay but when Arya gets back to Winterfell i need there to be a scene where she takes flowers to Ned’s grave like she did when he was alive. 

“One day she came back grinning her horsey grin, her hair all tangled and her clothes covered in mud, clutching a raggedy bunch of purple and green flowers for Father. Sansa kept hoping he would tell Arya to behave herself and act like the highborn lady she was supposed to be, but he never did, he only hugged her and thanked her for the flowers.” - Sansa I, AGoT

Or like he did for Lyanna.

“Ned could recall none of it. “I bring her flowers when I can,” he said. “Lyanna was … fond of flowers.” - Ned I, AGoT

summary: Hey, do you mind answering something? GRRM has made Daenerys T. and Arya S. incredibly similar, from monstrous pets, to being...
question: Hey, do you mind answering something? GRRM has made Daenerys T. and Arya S. incredibly similar, from monstrous pets, to being exiled and having similar predispositions towards the common folk, what is the actual need of two female characters being almost similar? Because I definitely do not subscribe to the belief of Daenerys dying in some holy sacrificial way, and Arya's future remains unclear with all three of her surviving brothers closer to home than she is.
answer:
I see Arya and Dany representing two types of the disenfranchised female for the express purpose of showing, later on, that females in a strictly patriarchal society can rise above gendered oppression and wield power in a way that is equal to (and in some cases, even above) male power players. Because I too disagree that Arya’s and Dany’s stories end with the fandom’s ignorant interpretation of cheap death or life in solitude.

Arya and Dany are very similar, to the point that it is no longer happenstance, but purposeful. Like you mentioned, there are numerous parallels, from their magic to their monsters to their personalities. In fact, they have more in common than they do in opposition of one another.

However, where they do differ is their origins—and this is what I meant by the “two types of disenfranchised female.” Where Dany was essentially born into violence and poverty, Arya had the luxury of stability and wealth; Dany had a tumultuous and abusive relationship with her older brother, while Arya’s only truly problematic relationship was with her snotty sister; Dany had no parental guidance, and Arya had both fully present. They were many stark (pun intended) differences in their upbringings. But what is most important is that they both hit rock bottom.

That they both hit their rock bottoms is an essential part of their rise to strength. It brags of their sheer power. Dany’s lowest point is with a dead husband, few followers, infant dragons, lost and dying in the desert, and constantly afraid of all the people that want her dead. Arya’s is with dead parents, dead siblings, a lost direwolf she’s convinced hates her, homeless in Westeros, and on the run from those who want her captured or killed. Pretty similar treks, right?

Their uphill journeys produce much the same as well. Crazy strong bonds with their animals, even with physical distance separating them; their magic growing; their cunning becoming sharper; stepping into positions of power, be it as queen or assassin; learning of new cultures and languages; forming alliances and inspiring followers. All this is, in my opinion, meant to signify that women too can be or become powerful in a male-driven society. Especially after the war against the Others, as they are two of the singled-out “five” (and the only two females of those five) that stand apart from the rest in terms of narrative/climactic impact.

GRRM also probably just wanted some kickass girls, because what’s better than the beauty doppelgängers of one of Westeros’ most famous pair of “lovers,” who ride dragons and command an army of Unsullied and lead a pack direwolves, who have firsthand experience in ruling an empire and assassinating diplomats and merchants alike, who hail from two of the oldest, most prestigious bloodlines? Yeah, nothing.

summary: a lifetime ago  Will I ever get tired of drawing happy starklings in the snow? NO!   I wanted to add Jon, Robb and Theon as...
caption:
a lifetime ago

Will I ever get tired of drawing happy starklings in the snow? NO! 

I wanted to add Jon, Robb and Theon as well, but didn’t like the way they turned out, so just imagine them trying to act adult someplace else. And I actually like it better this way, because I feel like the dynamic between Sansa Arya and Bran is often overlooked.

reblog.comment:
a lifetime ago

trail.content:
a lifetime ago

Will I ever get tired of drawing happy starklings in the snow? NO! 

I wanted to add Jon, Robb and Theon as well, but didn’t like the way they turned out, so just imagine them trying to act adult someplace else. And I actually like it better this way, because I feel like the dynamic between Sansa Arya and Bran is often overlooked.

summary:
Arya Stark & Nymeria by Viridiana López She had yellow eyes. When they caught the sunlight, they gleamed like 
two golden coins....
caption:
Arya Stark & Nymeria by Viridiana López

She had yellow eyes. When they caught the sunlight, they gleamed like two golden coins. Arya had named her after the warrior queen of the Rhoyne, who had led her people across the narrow sea. That had been a great scandal too. - AGoT Arya I

body:
Twin Love

(Y/F/A) stands for the first letter to your name.

My name is (Y/N) Stark I’m the first born but then there’s my twin brother Robb.

Robb and I have this special bond that no one can understand. You see we shared a womb and we have a special connection that no one knows about.

Robb and I have strong feeling for each other and if anyone were to find out about it we would be disowned by mother and father so we kept our relationship a secret.

The day it began, it was Bran’s ninth name day while the others where busy watching Bran open gifts Robb and I ran off to the top of an old tower that everyone has forgotten about. Robb opens the door and pushes me against the wall and kisses me passionately. “Oh Robb please I need you please” (Y/N) moaned into Robb’s ear, that’s all it took for Robb to take his trousers off and pull up you dress just as he was getting ready to fuck you hard against the old tower walls he heard scratching on the door Robb opened it to find both his and your direwolves. Graywind ran in to soon after so did Visenya.

(Y/N) and Robb knew they must go back to the party if not then father would have a search party look for us.

(Y/N) and Robb often wrote love letters to each other but only using the first letter of each other’s name (Y/N) remembers the first letter she wrote Robb.

My dear love R,

I have missed your touch I dream about you all night but when I wake your not there anymore I cry myself to sleep sometimes because I know we can never be together as husband and wife and never have children of our own I hate that we can not be together ever. I wish we could run off and marry in secrecy and have children.

Would you ever run away with me Robb?

Love yours truly (Y/F/A)

Robb’s letter back to (Y/N).

My dear love (Y/F/A),

Yes I would run away with you but if we did marry and have children they would just be known as bastards and I don’t want that for our children and what if you do end up with a babe what will you tell your father I wish with all my heart that we could be like the Targaryens but we are not them my love and I am sorry that I can not give you the life you want my love.

Your truly Robb.

(Y/N) knew it was true she could never be with Robb, so they kept hidden and made love that night not knowing it would be there last, because the king was riding in to ask your lord father to the new hand and your father would expect the offer because he feared for his dear friends life so he had to say yes to King Robert.

The Kings arrival

That day (Y/N) had to wear a new dress that fit her body so tight, Theon made comments about how (Y/N) looked fuckable and he would be so lucky to have your hand if your father would let him, Robb was angry at Theon’s words so Robb pushed Theon and told him.

“ Never talk filth about my sister again Greyjoy” Robb said.

“Or what Robb I bet I can fuck her so good she’ll beg to marry me “ Theon said.

That’s what pushed it little did they know (Y/N) was right outside the door listening to what they were saying. (Y/N) walked into the room and some men bowed “My lady , My lady “ (Y/N) looked and saw Robb about to punch Theon. “Robb please leave him be” (Y/N) said Robb looked up at his twin and looked at Theon and got off of him. “ Told you she wanted me” Theon said. (Y/N) “ Please stop this and Theon I would never want you my heart belongs to another lord” (Y/N) said. The look on Theon’s face made (Y/N) giggle.

But little to (Y/N) and Robb’s knowledge (Y/N) had a secret admirer and who might that man be it was none other then the cold hearted man Ramsay Snow he would watch (Y/N) all the time and he would even go into her room when no one was around to catch him he was obsessed with (Y/N) and no one knew about it.

King Robert came and talked to father and then they went down to the crypt so long Robert could pay his respects to our aunt Lyanna.

The queen didn’t look to happy about that at all she hated us (Y/N) could tell by the way she looked at all six of the Starks.

As we went back to our rooms Sansa wouldn’t shut up about the handsome prince and how she couldn’t wait to marry him and have his babes (Y/N) smiles at her sister and said how do you know your going to marry him and not me or Arya she looked up at (Y/N) and said “Oh I never thought about that but if you marry him could you tell me what he is like as a person and a king and or a father (Y/N) “.

(Y/N) looked at her sister and said “ Trust me Sansa I would never marry the boy prince you are more his type he will love you and if he doesn’t he’s a fool for not loving you” what (Y/N) said made Sansa‘s heart warm up and she smiled.

Robb ran as fast as his feet could take him to find you “(Y/N) (Y/N) please open the door” Robb was banging on (Y/N)’s door “What is it Robb” (Y/N) asked “ Father said yes to the king and he is taking you and Sansa and Arya with him to Kingslanding” (Y/N) looked down and started to cry (Y/N) could not leave the man she loves, she can’t leave the only person who truly understands her (Y/N) is afraid that she will never ever see the man she loves again.

What will happen when they leave there home and the one thing (Y/N) was trying to hide comes out you will have to wait for part two.

reblog.comment:
Twin Love

(Y/F/A) stands for the first letter to your name.

My name is (Y/N) Stark I’m the first born but then there’s my twin brother Robb.

Robb and I have this special bond that no one can understand. You see we shared a womb and we have a special connection that no one knows about.

Robb and I have strong feeling for each other and if anyone were to find out about it we would be disowned by mother and father so we kept our relationship a secret.

The day it began, it was Bran’s ninth name day while the others where busy watching Bran open gifts Robb and I ran off to the top of an old tower that everyone has forgotten about. Robb opens the door and pushes me against the wall and kisses me passionately. “Oh Robb please I need you please” (Y/N) moaned into Robb’s ear, that’s all it took for Robb to take his trousers off and pull up you dress just as he was getting ready to fuck you hard against the old tower walls he heard scratching on the door Robb opened it to find both his and your direwolves. Graywind ran in to soon after so did Visenya.

(Y/N) and Robb knew they must go back to the party if not then father would have a search party look for us.

(Y/N) and Robb often wrote love letters to each other but only using the first letter of each other’s name (Y/N) remembers the first letter she wrote Robb.

My dear love R,

I have missed your touch I dream about you all night but when I wake your not there anymore I cry myself to sleep sometimes because I know we can never be together as husband and wife and never have children of our own I hate that we can not be together ever. I wish we could run off and marry in secrecy and have children.

Would you ever run away with me Robb?

Love yours truly (Y/F/A)

Robb’s letter back to (Y/N).

My dear love (Y/F/A),

Yes I would run away with you but if we did marry and have children they would just be known as bastards and I don’t want that for our children and what if you do end up with a babe what will you tell your father I wish with all my heart that we could be like the Targaryens but we are not them my love and I am sorry that I can not give you the life you want my love.

Your truly Robb.

(Y/N) knew it was true she could never be with Robb, so they kept hidden and made love that night not knowing it would be there last, because the king was riding in to ask your lord father to the new hand and your father would expect the offer because he feared for his dear friends life so he had to say yes to King Robert.

The Kings arrival

That day (Y/N) had to wear a new dress that fit her body so tight, Theon made comments about how (Y/N) looked fuckable and he would be so lucky to have your hand if your father would let him, Robb was angry at Theon’s words so Robb pushed Theon and told him.

“ Never talk filth about my sister again Greyjoy” Robb said.

“Or what Robb I bet I can fuck her so good she’ll beg to marry me “ Theon said.

That’s what pushed it little did they know (Y/N) was right outside the door listening to what they were saying. (Y/N) walked into the room and some men bowed “My lady , My lady “ (Y/N) looked and saw Robb about to punch Theon. “Robb please leave him be” (Y/N) said Robb looked up at his twin and looked at Theon and got off of him. “ Told you she wanted me” Theon said. (Y/N) “ Please stop this and Theon I would never want you my heart belongs to another lord” (Y/N) said. The look on Theon’s face made (Y/N) giggle.

But little to (Y/N) and Robb’s knowledge (Y/N) had a secret admirer and who might that man be it was none other then the cold hearted man Ramsay Snow he would watch (Y/N) all the time and he would even go into her room when no one was around to catch him he was obsessed with (Y/N) and no one knew about it.

King Robert came and talked to father and then they went down to the crypt so long Robert could pay his respects to our aunt Lyanna.

The queen didn’t look to happy about that at all she hated us (Y/N) could tell by the way she looked at all six of the Starks.

As we went back to our rooms Sansa wouldn’t shut up about the handsome prince and how she couldn’t wait to marry him and have his babes (Y/N) smiles at her sister and said how do you know your going to marry him and not me or Arya she looked up at (Y/N) and said “Oh I never thought about that but if you marry him could you tell me what he is like as a person and a king and or a father (Y/N) “.

(Y/N) looked at her sister and said “ Trust me Sansa I would never marry the boy prince you are more his type he will love you and if he doesn’t he’s a fool for not loving you” what (Y/N) said made Sansa‘s heart warm up and she smiled.

Robb ran as fast as his feet could take him to find you “(Y/N) (Y/N) please open the door” Robb was banging on (Y/N)’s door “What is it Robb” (Y/N) asked “ Father said yes to the king and he is taking you and Sansa and Arya with him to Kingslanding” (Y/N) looked down and started to cry (Y/N) could not leave the man she loves, she can’t leave the only person who truly understands her (Y/N) is afraid that she will never ever see the man she loves again.

What will happen when they leave there home and the one thing (Y/N) was trying to hide comes out you will have to wait for part two.
